ECEnumeration.description: Used for setting MaterialProfile placement for CurveMemberSystem.
Used for setting classification for SurfaceMember.
Used for setting classification for CurveMember.

ECEntityClass.description: Abstract class for all topology-related classes to derive from.

Abstract class is topology type that can shared by multiple other Elements. The sharing defines the connectivity of the topological network. Each subclass is also the lowest level concept for a particular dimensionality (Face is the lowest 2D concept).

Abstract class as a common parent class for each topology type that is not shared. Each subclass represents a direct or indirect collection of the shared topology. Each subclass is also a collection of the topology of the same dimensionality.
An identified location in 3D space.
A curve connecting two Vertices.

ECProperty.description: Location (ICurvePrimitive).

ECEntityClass.description: This Aspect stores the Edges (and related data) for a Path.

ECProperty.description: Zero based index for Edge order in Path.
Shows if direction matches edge direction.

ECEntityClass.description: A Path that does not need to be closed and is not defining the boundary of a face.
Element which uses child Paths to represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Paths.

ECEntityClass.description: A Path that does not need to be closed and is not defining the boundary of a face.
Element which uses child Wire do represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Wire.

ECEntityClass.description: A Path that is closed and defines a boundary of a Face.
Element which uses child Loop to represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Loop.

ECEntityClass.description: A surface bounded by Loops.
This Aspect stores the Faces (and related data) for a FaceSet.

ECProperty.description: Shows if direction matches Face direction.

ECEntityClass.description: A set of Edge-connected Faces with compatible orientations (up directions). This class defines common data and functionality for Sheet and Shell (future).
A FaceSet that may be open or closed, and does not bound a Region (future concept). Sheets are also constrained to have a single base Surface.
Element which uses child Sheet do represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Sheet.

ECEntityClass.description: TODO: Add Description
Analysis Element
Abstract class for all Structural Analysis Element classes to descend from.
Abstract class for all member classes to descend from.
Defines a Member that is located along a Path, and whose behavior is defined along that Path.

ECProperty.description: Shows Curve Member Orientation at the start of the member. Must be unit vector and perpendicular to curveMember direction at start.
defines the lenght of Rigid Zone at the start of Curve Member
defines the lenght of Rigid Zone at the end of Curve Member

ECProperty.displayLabel: 2d offset defined in local coordinate systems, where first vector variable shows offset along binormal and sencond along Orientation

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a Member that is located by an Shell, and whose behavior is defined at that Shell.
Defines a region of a SurfaceMember that has different behavior (or is an opening).
Defines a solid region of a SurfaceMember that has different behavior.
Defines a void region of a SurfaceMember.

ECProperty.description: Force in X axis.
Force in Y axis.
Force in Z axis.
Moment abount X axis.
Moment abount Y axis.
Moment abount Z axis.
Force per unit length in X axis.
Force per unit length in Y axis.
Force per unit length in Z axis.
Moment per unit length abount X axis.
Moment per unit length abount Y axis.
Moment per unit length abount Z axis.
Force per unit area in X axis.
Force per unit area in Y axis.
Force per unit area in Z axis.

ECEntityClass.description: An Element that directly or indirectly defines a point location and clear coordinate system.

An Element that directly or indirectly defines a curve location and a clear coordinate system with the z-axis along the curve. The Element may have cardinal points defined; if not all the cardinal points should be considered to lie on the z-axis.

An Element that directly or indirectly defines a surface location and a clear coordinate system with the x- and y- axes in the surface. The Element may have a top, bottom and center defined; if not, the top and bottom and center should be considered to lie on the surface.
Abstract class to define a relative location.
Point relative to other elements.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to point location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to point.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to curve location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to curve.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to surface.
Curve relative to other elements.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Curve relative to curve location data
ECEntityClass.description: Curve relative to curve.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Curve relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Curve relative to surface.
Surface relative to other elements.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Surface relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Surface relative to surface.
A value that can be applied to a (compatible) Load.
A LoadValueAspect that can be assigned to a PointLoad.
A PointLoadValueAspect for Force.
A LoadValueAspect that can be assigned to a CurveLoad.
A CurveLoadValueAspect that has constant intensity along the application length.
A UniformCurveLoadValueAspect for Force.
A CurveLoadValueAspect that varies in intensity along the application length.
A VaryingCurveLoadValueAspect for Force.
A LoadValueAspect that can be assigned to a SurfaceLoad.
A SurfaceLoadValueAspect that has constant intensity across the application area.
A UniformSurfaceLoadValueAspect for Force.
A SurfaceLoadValueAspect that varies in intensity across the application area.
A VaryingSurfaceLoadValueAspect for Force.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Load applited to a relative location
ECEntityClass.description: An structural imposition of any type (force, displacement, environmental).

ECProperty.description: Coordinate system of th load.

ECEntityClass.description: A Load that is applied at a point..
A Load that is applied along a curve.
A Load that is applied over a surface.

ECEnumeration.description: Used for specifying LoadType in LoadContainer.

ECEntityClass.description: A collection of loads.

ECProperty.description: Load Type.
Self Weight Vector. Must be a unit vector.

ECEntityClass.description: Collection of loads only for grouping purposes.
Collection of loads that act over the structure as a case.
Combination of LoadCases.
Combination of LoadCases.

ECProperty.description: Load combination type.

ECEntityClass.description: Combination of LoadCases.

ECProperty.description: Load Combination SRSS factor

ECEntityClass.description: Abstract class to define a Factored Load Aspect.
Adds a factor to a specified LoadGroup.

ECProperty.description: Factor to be applied to the group.

ECEntityClass.description: Adds a factor to a specified LoadCase.

ECProperty.description: Factor to be applied to the group.

ECEntityClass.description: Adds a factor to a specified LoadCase.
